You must specify skeleton (boilerplate) from which new app will be initialized.

You can specify alias, Git URL or GitHub URI (gh:user/repo):

{{command}} simple [optional-dir]
{{command}} https://github.com/brunch/dead-simple
{{command}} <URI>

Some suggestions:

{{suggestions}}
Other 50+ skeletons are available at
http://brunch.io/skeletons
